column4: I added to the Ubuntu 7.10 Grub kernel line the boot parameter "vga=791" and rebootet. Now (http://ubuntuusers.de/paste/19063/) all consoles are black. What went wrong?
not sure, but after gutsy upgrade here I had to remove the "vga=791" to get my consoles back, so it's not just you
haven't had a chance to troubleshoot it yet
Interesting! Thank you for your comment.
